channel.title: Webclient error. read please
channel.description:
Hello, i madet my webclient its works then i just use the jar file. but then i wanna make it online i get this error by java console:
[code]java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at client.<init>(client.java:12763) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$12.run(Unknown Source) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission C:\xXxScape read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.findcachedir(signlink.java:31) at Class9.<clinit>(Class9.java:11) ... 16 more Exception: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError[/code] And i don't know how to fix it.
Thanks for you help.

item.title: Webclient error. read please
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

Get teamview at http://teamviewer.com and send me the ID that you get once you’ve downloaded it and then I’ll connect and fix for you!

-Nameme123

item.title: Webclient error. read please
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello, i madet my webclient its works then i just use the jar file. but then i wanna make it online i get this error by java console:

java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at client.<init>(client.java:12763) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$12.run(Unknown Source) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission C:\xXxScape read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.findcachedir(signlink.java:31) at Class9.<clinit>(Class9.java:11) ... 16 more Exception: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
And i don’t know how to fix it.

Thanks for you help.
